name: Superman
description: Faster than a speeding bullet, more powerful than a locomotive… Rocketed to Earth as an infant from the doomed planet Krypton, Kal-El was adopted by the loving Kent family and raised in America´s heartland as Clark Kent. Using his immense solar-fueled powers, he became Superman to defend mankind against all manner of threats while championing truth, justice and freedom.

enemies.name: Lex Luthor
enemies.description: No Superman villain is as well known, or as well-loved as Lex Luthor. Often seen as the de facto leader of all of the DCU's supervillains

enemies.name: Darkseid
enemies.description: The tyrannical ruler of Apokolips, a sadistic tyrant who has invaded and conquered countless worlds throughout the universe

enemies.name: Doomsday
enemies.description: A weapon crafted in the most extreme conditions, Doomsday is an unstoppable force of destruction, devastation and death

enemies.name: Zod
enemies.description: Once considered an outstanding military hero of the planet Krypton, General Dru-Zod decided he would rather rule his world than serve it

enemies.name: Brainiac
enemies.description: One of the most intelligent beings in the entire universe, the wicked Brainiac's genius has challenged Superman over and over again

enemies.name: Bizarro
enemies.description: As result of a bizarre science experiment, Bizarro is an imperfect duplicate of Kal-El, with none of his intelligence or self-control

events.title: character creation
events.description: Superman was created by Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster. First appearance in Action Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: superman - the film
events.description: Directed by Richard Donner, it is considered the first super hero blockbuster of history

events.title: the arcade game
events.description: Released by Taito, this arcade beat ’em up/shoot ’em up was incredible successful at its time

events.title: the death of superman
events.description: Crossover story which contains one of the most relevant events across all the character history

events.title: man of steel - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zack Snyder, it was the highest-grossing solo Superman movie of all time

name: Batman
description: Bruce Wayne, who witnessed the murder of his billionaire parents as a child, swore to avenge their deaths. He trained extensively to achieve mental and physical perfection, mastering martial arts, detective skills, and criminal psychology. Costumed as a bat to prey on the fears of criminals, and utilizing a high-tech arsenal, he became the legendary dark night of Gotham.

enemies.name: Lex Luthor
enemies.description: No Superman villain is as well known, as well-loved, or as well-traveled as Lex Luthor. Often seen as the de facto leader of all of the DCU's supervillains

events.title: character creation
events.description: Batman was created by Bob Kane y Bill Finger. First appearance in Detective Comics #27

events.title: robin creation
events.description: Robin was introduced as a junior crime-fighting partner for Batman in Detective Comics #38

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: the dark night returns
events.description: It is widely considered one of the greatest and most influential Batman stories ever made

events.title: batman - the film
events.description: Directed by Tim Burton and starred by Michael Keaton, it was a really successful blockbuster

events.title: arkham asylum - the game
events.description: The beginning of a relevant franchise, it was one of the best superhero games of history

name: WonderWoman
description: Armed with superpowers of a god, Wonder Woman is one of Earth´s most powerful defenders of peace, justice, and equality in addition to be a member of the Justice League. Her original origin allegorically depicted her as a clay figure brought to life by the gods, but in recent years she has been depicted more literally as the daughter of Zeus and the Amazon queen Hippolyta.

enemies.name: Cheetah
enemies.description: Cheetah may not only be the most famous of all of Wonder Woman's rogue gallery, but also the most lethal since she is the avatar of a god

enemies.name: Ares
enemies.description: The Greek god of war is obviously a very dangerous foe. Ares is constantly lusting for more violence being extremely brutal in battle

enemies.name: Circe
enemies.description: Based on the sorceress of Greek mythology who imprisoned Odysseus, the Circe of the comics contains much of her mythological traits

enemies.name: Veronica Cale
enemies.description: A scientific genius and uber-rich (as the half-owner of a pharmaceutical company). Cale is to Wonder Woman what Lex Luthor is to Superman

enemies.name: Doctor Psycho
enemies.description: This villain is sadistic, vile, and misogynistic. In some ways, he is the polar opposite of everything that Diana Prince actually stands for

enemies.name: Silver Swan
enemies.description: From ugly duckling to murderous cyborg, Silver Swan might just have the most versatile resume of all of Wonder Woman’s rogue’s gallery

events.title: character creation
events.description: Wonderwoman was created by W. M. Marston and H. G. Peter. First appearance in A.A Comics #8

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: wonder woman - the series
events.description: Starred by Kinda Carter, this portrayal of the character strongly influenced comics

events.title: gods and mortals
events.description: Run by George Perez, it is considered the greatest run of the hero in comic book history

events.title: wonder woman - the movie
events.description: Directed by Patty Jenkins and starred by Gal Gadot, it received a positive response from critics

events.title: the official game
events.description: A single-player open-world action game, it is the first one starred by Amazonian warrior

name: TheFlash
description: Having discovered his mother murdered and his father blamed for the act, forensic scientist Barry Allen sought conscientiously to clear his father´s alias and find the real killer. After being doused in chemicals and struck by lightning, Barry was granted the gift of super-speed. Nowadays he protects his hometown of Central City as The Flash, the scarlet speedster.

enemies.name: Reverse Flash
enemies.description: Shaping a dark mirror of the character, he traveled back in time and killed Flash's mother, which is what led Flash to become a hero

enemies.name: Grood
enemies.description: Hailing from Gorilla City, a hidden society of highly evolved apes, Grodd has frequently tried to infiltrate and conquer man's world

enemies.name: Savitar
enemies.description: Taking his name from the Hindu god-of-motion, Savitar was a pilot whose plane was suddenly struck by lightning, giving him super-speed

enemies.name: The Thinker
enemies.description: With a weaponized chair. The Thinker is the smartest villain on this list and is therefore one step ahead of the hero most of the times

enemies.name: Captain Cold
enemies.description: This dangerous criminal is not a superpowered villain but instead uses weapons and tech that freezes everything around instantly

enemies.name: Mirror Master
enemies.description: A lifelong criminal who became in a master of illusion, he makes use of his mirror gun to vex and addle the Scarlet Speedster at every turn

events.title: character creation
events.description: Flash was created by Gardner Fox and Harry Lampert. First appearance in Flash Comics #1

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: the flash - nineties series
events.description: Starred by John W.Shipp, this series was plenty of weird sci-fi villains and special effects

events.title: flashpoint
events.description: Perhaps the most iconic of all modern timelines involving the Flash, it was a reboot of the hero

events.title: the flash - the series
events.description: This tv series had 8 seasons developed within the fictional universe known the Arrowverse

events.title: justice league - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zach Snyder, this film supposed the first appearance of the character in the big screens

name: GreenLantern
description: Gifted with the ability to overcome great fear and harness the power of will, test-pilot Hal Jordan was chosen to be the Green Lantern of Sector 2814 inheriting the ring of the dying alien Green Lantern, Abin Sur. Through sheer will power and determination, Hal has established an impressive record of heroism and brave performances across the galaxy with the help of his fellow Green Lanterns.

enemies.name: Lex Luthor
enemies.description: No Superman villain is as well known, as well-loved, or as well-traveled as Lex Luthor. Often seen as the de facto leader of all of the DCU's supervillains

events.title: character creation
events.description: Greenlantern was created by M. Nodell and Bill Finger. First appearance in A.A Comics #16

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: Emerald Twilight
events.description: This iconic storyline changed the super hero forever by shaking up the status quo for the character

events.title: Sinestro Corps War
events.description: Ranked among the top comic books of the year, the fan reception of this crossover was highly positive

events.title: green lantern - the movie
events.description: Directed by Martin Campbell and starred by Ryan Reynolds, the film receive negative reviews overall

events.title: green lantern - the game
events.description: Green Lantern: Rise of the Manhunters is an enjoyable and predictable beat-'em-up action game

name: Aquaman
alias: The king of the seven seas
description: The son of an Atlantean queen and a lighthouse keeper from the town of Amnesty Bay, Arthur Curry would grow up to become the powerful superhero Aquaman, and later take on his birthright as the King of Atlantis. He is the bridge between the surface world and his tumultuous realm of the sea in addition to being an important founding member of the Justice League.

enemies.name: Black Manta
enemies.description: This villain is the main Aquaman's arch-nemesis. Consumed by his vendetta, he seeks the death of Arthur and the destruction of Atlantis

enemies.name: Dead King
enemies.description: Atlan is an ancient ruler of Atlantis who actually represents all of the worst elements of Atlantean culture. He is racist and elitist

enemies.name: Ocean Master
enemies.description: The Ocean Master has seen himself as the true and unique king of Atlantis and has butted heads with Arthur on numerous occasions

enemies.name: Trench
enemies.description: A former tribe of Atlantis that mutated to in the depths, the Trench is a huge menace which exists only to feed and kill anything it sees

enemies.name: Siren
enemies.description: Considered to be one of the greatest female villains of Aquaman's rogue's gallery, Siren is the sister of Mera and sister-in-law to Arthur

enemies.name: Corum Rath
enemies.description: Leader of the eco-terrorist group known as the Deluge, Corum Rath became Atlantis king. This enemy forms a dark mirror to Aquaman

events.title: character creation
events.description: Aquaman was created by Paul Norris and Mort Weisinger. First appearance in M.F Comics #73

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: Founder of the Justice League whose first appearing was in The Brave and the Bold #28

events.title: aquaman - the series
events.description: This tv series was comprised of adventures featuring Aquaman and his sidekick Aqualad

events.title: aquaman - the trench
events.description: One of the most relevant storylines of the character, it was a strong rebirth for the hero

events.title: justice league - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zach Snyder, this film supposed the first appearance of the character in the big screens

events.title: aquaman - the movie
events.description: Directed by James Wan, it obtained a total worldwide gross of $1.148 billion

name: Cyborg
description: Half man, half machine - all hero! After a near fatal incident, Victor Stone was cybernetically enhanced by his father. He now possesses the ability to communicate, manipulate, and interface with nearly all forms of technology. As he is constantly upgrading, he promises to defend the future from any threat. Furthermore, he is a founding member of the Justice League.

enemies.name: H8-Bit
enemies.description: He was a brilliant hacker before becoming in one of the unique villains of this era due to his electricity powers and technology control

enemies.name: Magenta
enemies.description: Magenta suffers from a mental illness that gave her a dissociative personality disorder. Also, she owns strange powers related to magnetism

enemies.name: Shrapnel
enemies.description: This villain is a walking piece of organic metal with super-strength, endurance, and self-sustainability. An actual threat for any hero

enemies.name: Grid
enemies.description: Grid is a malevolent sentient computer virus that lived within Cyborg’s. It's main goal is to feel the emotions of other living things

enemies.name: Cyborg Girl
enemies.description: Her aunt replaced her body with powerful cybernetic implants. Sadly, those upgrades are not used for the good of humanity at all

enemies.name: Bobby Zirrozinski
enemies.description: A strong hatred for Cyborg, he is a military veteran who underwent a backdoor operation to add cybernetic attachments to his body

events.title: character creation
events.description: Cyborg was created by Marv Wolfman and George Pérez. First appearance in DC C.P #26

events.title: the flash - nineties series
events.description: One of the founders of new teen titans in the eighties. He was an outstanding member of the squad

events.title: smallville
events.description: Being a secondary role, it supposed the first live-action portrayal of the superhero

events.title: justice league anexation
events.description: He was established as a founding member of the Justice League in DC's 2011 reboot

events.title: the imitation of life
events.description: Composed of 10 separated blocks, this relevant storyline was the rebirth of the character

events.title: justice league - the movie
events.description: Directed by Zach Snyder, this film supposed the first appearance of the character in the big screens
